keyPolicies.policyDescription: Justin will push for the Climate Change Act targets to be met and exceeded.
He promises a £10 minimum wage, a 'wealth tax' on the top 1%, and no tax on the minimum wage.
He stands for smaller class sizes, no tuition fees, and bringing Academies and Free Schools into local authority control.
Justin plans for more council houses, capping rents and ending lettings-agent fees.
He advocates keeping the NHS public, and increasing its funding.
He supports proportional representation and a fully-elected House of Lords.

issues.economy: Justin vows to build a fair economy with a £10 minimum wage, a 'wealth tax' on the top 1%, and no tax on the minimum wage.
issues.education: He supports smaller class sizes, no tuition fees, and restoring control of Academies and Free Schools to local authorities.
issues.environment: Will push for the Climate Change Act targets to be met and exceeded.
issues.governance: Supports proportional representation and a fully-elected House of Lords.
issues.health: Promises to keep the NHS public and to increase funding.

housing.content: Plans include more council houses, capping rents, and ending lettings-agent fees.

endorsements.endorsement: ‘The dedication shown by Justin and many members in Bristol has been absolutely inspiring. Let’s get him elected as the next Green MP.’
